Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.0.5.0:
   Add swap groups, allowing you to dynamically change the layout in the main window.
   Adding encounters in the layout is now easier.
   Some other minor improvements.
